name: bb (Aarteate)
description:
In this game you play a robot which tries to escape an industrial building. But hurry, there is not much time. Luckily this robot learned how to control time.
Slow down time at your will to help the robot escape or press nothing to halt time.
But be careful, slow down time less to get a higher score!

This game is relevant to the game jam theme because you only have two seconds time for each level and there are two different sections in this game.

I used the game engine Unity to create this game. This is my first time particing in a game jam so I'm a beginner.

Assets I used in this Game:
Background Tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
Music: https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack
Font: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
